title: Rock art from at least 67,800 years ago in Sulawesi
summary:
Nature, Published online: 21 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09968-y

A hand stencil painted on a cave wall on a small island off the coast of Sulawesi more than 67,800 years ago suggests a very early occupation of Wallacea.
body: Nature, Published online: 21 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09968-y A hand stencil painted on a cave wall on a small island off the coast of Sulawesi more than 67,800 years ago suggests a very early occupation of Wallacea.
